Fallcatti commença sa vie active en tant que vétérinaire ornithologue à Turin, mettant en scène des spectacles musicaux. Ses critiques de livres sous le nom de Garganey lui rapportant assez, il abandonna son cabinet pour se concentrer sur la production de ce qu'il appelait des drames "écologiques"

Fallcatti started his working life as a veterinary ornithologist in Turin, staging musical pageants, until book reviews under the pen name Gargeny earned him enough to give up his surgery and concentrate on the production of what he called "ecological" dramas
